game.name: Demons Killers
game.shortDescription: Escape Liztheuz in this first-person psychological horror: a sealed university, a botched ritual, and two relentless hunters. Use items, follow key steps, and survive long enough to find the final exit.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Escape Liztheuz in this first-person psychological horror: a sealed university, a botched ritual, and two relentless hunters. Use items, follow key steps, and survive long enough to find the final exit.
